name: J Dillon
text: I was very impressed.  Pizza arrived piping hot.  It was also earlier than the posted time which was nice.  Tasted excellent.

text: Ordered the pizza-salad combo.  In the past it has been a fairly large salad that will feed multiple people.  The bowl I just received could fit in the palm of my hand.  Also previously flat crust pizzas came square and form fitting to the box.  They are now round.  It appears someone is really trying to save on materials...

text: Great food great staff and they delivered to our hotel room at 11:30 at night, everything was hot, soda was cold. The staff is top notch at this one.

text: I seriously love this place!   Ive lived in the area for a while now and wont go any where else for pizza! Great food and friendly staff. If you have any issues Karl will ALWAYS make sure you get properly taken care of! Thank you! Black jack is lucky to have an employee like you!

text: In town for a few days and found them on line. Ordered a small deep dish with pepperoni and prosciutto cotto. Pizza was rather expensive but looked good. Came in a relative good time. Very tasty but no pepperoni or prosciutto so it was definately overpriced

name: JR D
text: I've received good consistent pizza for two decades from this DU location.  I've given it good reviews because I get well made pizzas with sufficient toppings time after time.  It trumps the competitors for this type of pizza based on toppings.  Good pizza and good value.

name: Pete Stewart
text: I get pizza from Blackjack a couple times a week. It's really good and not too expensive. All of the employees are friendly, especially Alan. He's a cool guy and always makes me feel welcome. Blackjack will continue to get my business for years to come.

text: I just ordered from there tonight, there was a mistake with what was delivered (an honest mistake). I called back and they sent the right one immediately...very professional and very tasty! I will definitely order again

text: Did not answer the phone phone on the Wednesday night that the University of Denver GRADUATED- dumb business move. Also screwed up the last order we ordered from them. Amazing service guys, keep it up! Will never order again. Look somewhere else if you want reliable service

name: Marjorie Smith
text: Blackjack Pizza is a family favorite.  We've tried all the pizza places in the neighborhood and this is our perpetual #1.  We have Blackjack pizza (at least) every Saturday and my boys look forward to it all week.  Always friendly, the folks at this location are the best.

text: Best "chain" delivery pizza place around this area.  Far better than Dominos, Pizza Hut, or Papa John's in my opinion.

name: Anthony Thiros
text: Not the greatest pizza, but it's quick and cheap. A decent $5 medium pizza. Definitely worth it if you need some fast pizza!

name: Antoinette Hicks
